author: Faith
notes: When I was making this originally I looked a lot of retro horror movie posters. The ones that were painted rather than photographed. There's a lot of the same color schemes and the composition of them are all very similar so I had a lot of fun imitating their style!

author: Faith
notes: Everytime I look at Nadia's car I remember how terrible it is. Its the worst model of soviet cars Dan could find and I based the color off of my own family's car which is as old as Nadia's probably is.

author: Faith
notes: I really hope you get the mug reference. If you don't just google Big Hug Mug and you'll find the TV Shows it showed up in. One of which I may have slightly disturbed Dan with. ;)

author: Faith
notes: I'm half expecting theories that the lawn flamingo is responsible for all this. Look at it. All smug and pink.

author: Faith
notes: While drawing Steve's house I looked at a lot of suburban houses and they're all grey, beige, and white. Really boring. So for the interior I made it extra colorful.

author: Faith
notes: DO YOU LIKE GHOSTS? WE GOT GHOSTS. LOTS OF 'EM. COME ON DOWN AND PICK YOUR OWN GHOST! THIS ONES MISSING AN ARM. THIS ONE LOOKS LIKE A COCOON. BUY A GHOST!!!!

author: Faith
notes: This is my favorite page. I just love Steve sliding out in those bottom panels.

author: Faith
notes: Funfact: I forgot to color that candle blue the first time. I forget a lot of things.

author: Faith
notes: Jim, I know you're just trying to help, but apearing as a bunch of eye balls is not comforting.

author: Faith
notes: Jim has no people skills and thus is not allowed to answer the phones.

author: Faith
notes: NNOOO! THAT TABLE WAS FROM STEVES GRANDMOTHER! ITS HIS ONLY NONÂ­THRIFT STORE FURNITURE!!!

author: Faith
notes: That last line? I wrote it. I was me. I can be good at things too!

author: Faith
notes: Dan was repeatedly horrified by the second to last panel.

author: Faith
notes: Jim's eyes are actually based off of nautilus eyes which work similarly to a pinhole camera.
